Reviews.Title: “Great place with english speaking staff & awesome breakfast”
Reviews.Author: LeeJon13
Reviews.Content: decor nice location close vatican strolled rome guess walk usually described 3040 min historical rome metro roma pass makes movement easy breakfast filling front office staff spoke excellent english

Reviews.Title: “Great location our room very small, bathroom needs refitting”
Reviews.Author: peterlynn
Reviews.Content: breakfast continental american stated guest lounge breakfast served garden plastic winter clean walk passed bottom bed bathroom shower falling wall hair drier broken spare hair drier draw deep clean
